Title: A Kind of Loving
Writer: Willis Hall (screenplay), Keith Waterhouse (screenplay), Stan Barstow (adapted from the novel by)
Actors: Alan Bates, Thora Hird, Bert Palmer, Pat Keen
Plot: After his girlfriend's pregnancy forces him to marry her, a young man must adjust to his new life and contend with his domineering mother-in-law.
Awards: Nominated for 4 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 1 win.
